Room.Name: The Vaults
Room.ShortDescription: Here the path passes around the front of the great vaults. In the city it is rumored that a person of vast power is buried here, but everyone knows you can't just bury a very powerful being. The massive vaults are home to a monstrous lich, so be wary, as its magic controls the entire structure. You can sense the glow of some of your magical items grow dim in the presence of this monument.
